Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A $(this.appearance:breasts) right breast covered in $(this.appearance:fur) $(this.appearance:furcolor) fur. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-breast) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-breast).}

{? equal | $(this.appearance:cheekshape) | ordinary |A $(this.appearance:right-cheek) right cheek.|A $(this.appearance:right-cheek) right $(this.appearance:cheekshape) cheek.} {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-cheek) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-cheek).}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A right ear.|A $(this.appearance:earshape) right ear.} {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-ear) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-ear).}

{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A right earlobe.|A right $(this.appearance:earshape) earlobe.} {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-earlobe) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-earlobe).}

{? equal | $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) | ordinary |A right eyebrow.|A right $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) eyebrow.} {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-eyebrow) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-eyebrow).}
A set of $(this.appearance:eyelashes) eyelashes over a right eye.
A set of five $(this.appearance:clawlength) $(this.appearance:clawapp) right fingernails.
A set of right fingers, with nails at the ends. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-fingers) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-fingers).}
A normal anthro's right fingertips. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-fingertips) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-fingertips).}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:hands) | ordinary |A right hand.|A $(this.appearance:hands) right hand.} {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-hand) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-hand).}
A right index finger, with a nail at the end. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-index-finger) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-index-finger).}
A fingernail, at the end of a right index finger.
A normal person's right index fingertip. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-index-fingertip) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-index-fingertip).}
A set of right knuckles. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-knuckles) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-knuckles).}
A right middle finger, with a nail at the end. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-middle-finger) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-middle-finger).}
A fingernail, at the end of a right middle finger.
A normal human's right middle fingertip. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-middle-fingertip) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-middle-fingertip).}
The little finger on a right hand, with a nail at the end. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-pinky) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-pinky).}
A fingernail, at the end of a right pinky finger.
A pupil of the right eye.
A right ring finger, with a nail at the end. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-ring-finger) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-ring-finger).}
A fingernail, at the end of a right ring finger.
The triangular bone across the upper right back of the body, connected to the collarbone. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-shoulderblade) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-shoulderblade).}
The right side, between the right ribs and the right waist. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-side) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-side).}
The sole of a right foot. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-sole) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-sole).}
A right temple, on the side of the forehead. {? | $(this.combat:injury:right-temple) |It has $(this.combat:injury:right-temple).}
A fingernail, at the end of a right thumb finger.
